extendedInfo.description: This App will read by voice the notifications you want to hear.*WARNING: IF WHEN YOU ENABLE THIS APP AT ACCESSIBILITY YOUR DEVICE STARTS TO SPEAK EVERY TIME YOU TOUCH SOMETHING, THERE IS A PROBLEM WITH YOUR LAUNCHER. IT IS NOT THIS APP FAULT.TRY ANOTHER LAUNCHER FROM GOOGLE PLAY*Ready for this App notifications:- Gmail  - Including notification content (works better with Android 4.1+)- WhatsApp - Including notification content (works better with Android 4.1+)- Line - Including notification content- SpotBros - Including notification content- Viber - Including notification contentand the other you want. When a notification from a new App is read, this App will ask you to read this kind of notifications that you can allow or deny. This notifications are shown at menu / notifications where you can delete them.If your device is with screen on, the App will show you a banner with the content of the notification for 3 secs instead of read the message.*** SEND TO ***- Sony Smartwatch compatible. You will receive notifications at your Smartwatch too.- Pebble Watch compatible.- Mail. you can receive all your notifications in a mail account too.**** Samsung device Users: Samsung has a bug in his Android 4.x version. Is not a bug of this App, it is Samsung fault. https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=23105You can use Tasker or other App in order to enable or disable Voice for Notifications creating a Intent Broadcast Task with this actions: com.pacosal.acc.action.ONcom.pacosal.acc.action.OFFYou can enable or disable this App with a widget.Requirements:- TTS installed- Internet connection- Enable this App at Accessibility settings- For Smartwatch notifications enable this Extension at SmartConnect App.You can report bugs and follow this project at xda-developer forum http://www.google.com/url?q=http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=38511978Do you know my Welcome Pack for Sony SmartWatch? Search for it ASAP!If you find any bug, please send an email to pacosal@gmail.com in order to correct it.If you have any suggestion, please send an email to pacosal@gmail.com in order to implement it.twitter -> http://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/paco_salazar_twTags: whatsapp, voice, message, car, hands free, line, spotbros, google mail, sony, smartwatch, pebbleLiveWareâ¢ extension for SmartWatchSmart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2

reviews.title: Repetitive request
reviews.comment: Keeps asking the same question about android.systemui even already answered NO and it doesn\'t register this into the \"Denied Notification\" list. Pls fix. Thanks
reviews.author: Eric Goh

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Nice app, but it you have trouble with you android system of luncher, thn you\'re going to have a bad time.
reviews.author: Jose Carlo Paguada Castro

reviews.title: EXACTLY what I needed!
reviews.comment: I was looking for an app that could read both SMS and Google Voice incoming messages, instead of having two apps installed. Fits the bill perfectly!
reviews.author: Darren MacDonald

reviews.title: Pretty good but...
reviews.comment: Voice should be tied to the ringer volume. When phone is silent, it shouldn\'t read out the notification.
reviews.author: Derek Browne

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: I love this app Good job on creating this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: App works well, and the developer is constantly working on it an comunicating with users
reviews.author: Roberto Cocchiararo

reviews.title: Can\'t get it to work
reviews.comment: I would love to use this app but it just won\'t work for. Adding apps I wanted was a breeze and so was activating it. It even notifies me  but it just doesn\'t read it to me or use the voice. I\'m pretty bummed! :[
reviews.author: Travis Budke

reviews.title: Absolute piece of junk
reviews.comment: I know it\'s free but seriously no one will trust your apps if you put junk like this out.

reviews.title: Awful spam Shiite
reviews.comment: Awful app took over my phone disabled it had to for hard rest to remove it - don\'t bother
reviews.author: gary fowler

reviews.title: It doesn\'t work with Sony smart watch
reviews.comment: I\'m using Android Version 2.3.4 and installed this app to check my notification for Whatsapp and viber. but it\'s not working.
reviews.author: Jaz khan

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: It is a little annoying at first, asking if you want to enable reading of notifications for every app, that makes one, but after spending some time with it, it does what I need it to do.
reviews.author: Logan Arias
